name: DrunkBoyHalo!
description:
BadBoyHalo has drunk too much. And He is Out of Control! Save Him From Falling or Getting hit by a CAR and make him reach his home carefully! Also Dont STARVE to death!

Made For GMTK Game Jam 2020. #gmtkgamejam

Youtube: Prithvi Production

Disclaimer: This Game is Targeted to People who knows about Skeppy and BadBoyHalo. If you don't know them, you can still play it but you won't Understand memes in this game and won't enjoy much.

Thanks
